summary: This document is an email correspondence between Amanda Kirby and Richard Kahn discussing a wire transfer that was received into an account. Amanda confirms the receipt of the wire and provides her contact information, while Richard requests Amanda to look into the wire transfer from JPM to DB Hyperion Air Inc.
